inclusion.criterion: probable or definite localization-related, primary generalized or symptomatic epilepsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 2 anti-epilepsy drugs at standard doses, despite medication compliance
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 3 seizures/month in the 3-month period prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: history or symptoms of cardiovascular disease may be eligible on a case-by-case basis
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
